import React, { Component } from 'react' import Registration from './Registration.js' class Login extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={email:'', password:''} } // input textbox collection inputHandler=(e)=> { this.setState({ ...this.state , [e.target.name] : e.target.value } ) } render() { const {email,password}=this.state return( <>

LOG IN

) } } export default Login;
